mapper.select: select s.id id,s.name sname,SUM(o.number*c.price)-SUM(o.number*r.price) sumprice FROM shop_order o,shop_cs cs, shop_co co,shop_commodity c,shop_repertory r,shop_shop s,shop_user u where cs.shop_id=#{id} and o.status='已完成' and u.`code`!=4 and YEAR(o.orderdate)=#{year} and MONTH(o.orderdate)=#{month} and cs.shop_id=s.id and co.order_id=o.id and cs.commodity_id=co.commodity_id and c.name=r.commodityname and u.id=o.user_id

select s.id id,s.name sname,SUM(o.number*0.9*c.price)-SUM(o.number*r.price) sumprice FROM shop_order o,shop_cs cs, shop_co co,shop_commodity c,shop_repertory r,shop_shop s,shop_user u where cs.shop_id=#{id} and o.status='已完成' and u.`code`=4 and YEAR(o.orderdate)=#{year} and MONTH(o.orderdate)=#{month} and cs.shop_id=s.id and co.order_id=o.id and cs.commodity_id=co.commodity_id and c.name=r.commodityname and u.id=o.user_id
